title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Vibe modernize your .NET applications using AWS Transform and Kiro (MAM343)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS Transform 和 Kiro 现代化您的 .NET 应用程序 (MAM343)
abstract: Looking to make your .NET development faster and easier? Join this live coding session to see how AWS Transform for .NET and Kiro can make your daily coding much smoother! We'll take you through the whole process - starting with a legacy .NET Framework application and porting it into modern .NET using AWS Transform. Then, we'll use Kiro to refactor your codebase leveraging vibe coding and spec driven development. You'll see the entire end-to-end process of modernizing .NET applications, learning practical techniques to enhance your development productivity and efficiently upgrade your existing codebase.
abstract_cn: 想让您的 .NET 开发更快更简单吗？加入这个实时编程会话，了解 AWS Transform for .NET 和 Kiro 如何让您的日常编程更加顺畅！我们将带您完成整个过程 - 从传统的 .NET Framework 应用程序开始，使用 AWS Transform 将其移植到现代 .NET。然后，我们将使用 Kiro 重构您的代码库，利用氛围编程和规范驱动开发。您将看到 .NET 应用程序现代化的完整端到端过程，学习实用技术来提高开发效率并有效升级现有代码库。
